pr_title: Anomaly #32388 Sale Order and Invoice : set project to invoice and sale order lines when generated

timeline.message:
Sale Order and Invoice : set project to invoice and sale order lines when generated

-Link origin line project to sale order and invoice lines

Anomaly #32388

timeline.bodyText: Please do not inject a service from itself, you do not have to inject again the service to get overridden methods
timeline.author: ale-axelor
ale-axelor

timeline.bodyText: Please do not inject a service from itself, you do not have to inject again the service to get overridden methods
timeline.author: ale-axelor

timeline.bodyText: Never use Beans.get inside a loop, as it can cause performance issues. Here replace the class of purchaseOrderLineServiceSupplychainImpl to purchaseOrderLineServiceSupplychain
timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -150,8 +150,8 @@ public PurchaseOrder createPurchaseOrder(
 
     for (SaleOrderLine saleOrderLine : saleOrderLineList) {
       purchaseOrder.addPurchaseOrderLineListItem(
-          purchaseOrderLineServiceSupplychainImpl.createPurchaseOrderLine(
